fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • In Saturday’s Guide we misnamed the actor Michael Sheen, who is playing Chris Tarrant in ITV’s Quiz, as Martin Sheen (Sound & Vision, page 28); and the listing for Front Row Late on BBC Two this Thursday should have said “with Mary Beard”, not Mary Berry (page 50). • Homophone corner: “The palettes in Bordet’s warehouse are stacked for delivery, but new orders have dried up” (Crisis in Chablis: Wine hit by frost, drought and now virus, 11 April, page 16). • Other recently amended articles include: No flour, pasta or eggs? The perfect substitutes for 20 common ingredients UK police’s response to lockdown faces biggest test yet over Easter
